name: Ski or Die
description:
Ski or Die is a 1990 winter sports game by Electronic Arts for the Amiga, NES, MS-DOS and Commodore 64. It consists of 5 minigames which can be played individually or in a set sequentially. Up to 6 players can compete against each other via hotseat in 4 of the minigames, and semi-hotseat in 1 of them (up to two players at a time). The sports and activities depicted in the minigames are halfpipe-snowboarding, inflatable sled racing, aerial skiing, downhill skiing and snowball fights.
The MS-DOS port includes support for Roland MT-32 and AdLib audio.
